description:
A tricky target, with that huge star and dim nebulosity.

Preprocessing (all):

1. WeightedBatchProcessing, Subframe Selector, Image Registration, Local Normalization, Image Integration, Drizzle Integration, Dynamic Crop
2. Dynamic Background Extraction on R/G/B/Ha/SII
3. EZ Denoise on all

RGB:
1. Linear fit R/G/B
2. ChannelCombination R/G/B
3. Background Neutralization
4. Photometric Color Calibration
5. Histogram Transformation
6. Morphological Transformation

Narrowband:
1. EZ Soft Stretch
2. StarNet++
3. Histogram Tranformation to hide blotches
4. CloneStamp to remove huge stars
5. Multiscale Median Transform
6. PixelMath: R: Ha / G: 0.3*Ha + 0.7*SII / B: SII
7. Duplicate Ha to create L; Local Histogram Equalization
8. LRGB Combination to apply L to NB
9. Curves Transformation

Combination:
1. PixelMath: 1-((1-stars)*(1-nb))
title: IC 63 Cassiopeia's Ghost RGB + Ha + SII
